Living-Hinge Notebook

A notebook for the creative-minded
Order Now


class

Durable as Nature

The wood itself is durable. Whether crammed in backpacks or bathed in coffee, the notebook maintains its initial level of quality and useablility.

One Piece of Woodmore_vert
One Piece of Woodclose

The Living Hinge Notebook, designed by Rice University student Mac Lockard, is an incredible feat of engineering and design. The notebook is laser cut from a single piece of quality wood using a 'living hinge' method that gives the hinge the flexibility of a traditional notebook.

loop

Endless Pages

The Living Hinge Notebook holds a 7 x 5 inch notepad that can be removed and replaced whenever paper runs out. The notebook itself can be endlessly used.

Simple, Elegant, and most of all: Practical

shopping_cart

Pricing and Customization

Notebooks are $30 apiece. If you're a DFA member or Rice student, contact us for a discount price!

Personalize your notebook by getting custom text engraved into the notebook in Gotham or Electra. Adding custom engraved text is $5. Show off your DFA pride by getting the DFA logo engraved on your notebook as well!

Support design.

Design For America

Rice Studio

The Rice University Studio focuses on making an impact in the local Houston community through the human-centred design process. By working in interdisciplinary teams and focusing on the user, the studio creates thoughtful, practical, and helpful solutions.
